alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 11:12PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong gusty showers will impact portions of Martin, Johnson, northern Perry, Knott, Floyd, central Breathitt, Pike and Magoffin Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1111 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Blaine to Confluence. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusty showers will be near... Dice and Diablock around 1125 PM EST. Bulan, Cordia, Ary and Jeff around 1130 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these showers include Vicco, Ritchie, Emmalena, Fisty, Elic, Bearville, Talcum, Anco, Wiscoal, Sassafras, Hindman, Carrie, Tina, Amburgey, Vest, Smithsboro, Carr Creek, Dirk, Cody, Bath, Ivis, Mallie, Brinkley, Leburn, Garner, Spider, Soft Shell, Littcarr, Yellow Mountain, Pippa Passes, Hollybush, Drew, Larkslane, Nealy, Omaha, May, Ivan, Pine Top, Mousie, Wayland, Dry Creek, Kite, Topmost, Hall, Greenleaf, Raven, Demo, Glo, Wheelwright, Burton, Melvin, Halo, Buckingham, Hi Hat, Price, Speight, Orkney and East McDowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Pike
